gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 111, Heat 99
gameRecap.excerpt: The Cavaliers defeated the Heat, 111-99, to win their third straight game and improve to 13-9 on the year. Donovan Mitchell led the Cavaliers with 27 points, a career-high 13 rebounds, and six assists as Darius Garland added 18 points and six assists. Kyle Lowry (17 points, five assists) and Josh Richardson (17 points) led the Heat in the loss. The Heat move to 12-10 on the year.
